subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Russia reached the Davis Cup semifinals for the fourth consecutive year, eliminating the Czech Republic when the injured Tomas Berdych quit during the fifth set against Nikolay Davydenko. The win gave Russia an insurmountable 3-1 lead in the best-of-five quarterfinal. Berdych was leading, 2-1, in the fifth set when he fell as he reached for a forehand. He appeared to twist his right ankle.
